Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine purplish buff; washy slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) contains several such drawings. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 58-61. Name L. Lucius.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1272)
